description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget called NavDrawer, which is a customizable, collapsible navigation drawer used in the application's UI. It includes route shortcuts, a header with an avatar, and a sign-out option.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: Helper class representing individual navigation items, including icon, label, and route.

methods.name: NavDrawer
methods.description: Constructor for the NavDrawer widget, initializing a stateless widget with optional key.

methods.name: _items
methods.description: Creates a list of navigation items with associated icons, labels, and routes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree of the navigation drawer, including header, list of navigation items, and sign-out option.
